resources.string: QuizApp
Ants can live up to 25 years.
Most ants live from a couple of weeks to a few years but some queen ants can live up to 25 years.
Oxford University is older than the Aztec Empire.

According to Oxford University itself, “there is no clear date of foundation, but teaching existed at Oxford in some form in 1096 and developed rapidly from 1167. The Aztec Empire was founded around 300 years later.
There are 22 players on the field per team during a soccer game.
It\'s 11 players per team.
Washington, Jefferson, Lincoln, and Grant are the four presidents\' heads sculpted into Mount Rushmore.

Mount Rushmore features 60-foot (18 m) sculptures of the heads of four United States presidents: George Washington (1732–1799), Thomas Jefferson (1743–1826), Theodore Roosevelt (1858–1919), and Abraham Lincoln(1809–1865).
In Greek mythology, a Hydra had nine heads.
In Greek mythology the Lernaean Hydra was a gigantic, nine-headed water-serpent.
The world\'s first nuclear-powered submarine was called the Nautilus.
Launched in 1954 the USS Nautilus was the world\'s first operational nuclear-powered submarine.
The flag of Morocco has a red moon on a green background.
The flag of Morocco has a green star on a red background.
Haydn wrote more than 100 symphonies.
Classical composer Franz Joseph Haydn wrote 106 symphonies.
An "inferno" is a unit of heat equal to 1 billion K (about 1 billion °C).
The unit Inferno is used in astrophysics to describe the temperature inside a star.
The Russian parliament building in Moscow is called the White House.
The House of the Government of the Russian Federation is called "The White House".
That\'s correct!
That\'s incorrect!
